TopicTitle: MRT Glider - Multi Terrain Recovery vessel

Articles.Content:
Hello fellow kerbonauts!

As my very first post on this site, I would like to share with you my latest creation: the MTR Glider

This little vessel is designed to recover debris from all around Kerbin, be it on land or water

(It was inspired by Roflcopterkklol's Jet ATV mk3)

The Glider is capable (aka can be safely used) of up to 80 m/s on land and water, though lower speeds are advised

The mission it was created for is to recover all that junk left behind by the early flights in your career - be your reasons ecologic or economic

Should you need anything extra for your journey, just put it in the hold up front

Sure, VTOLs and other flying vehicles would be faster to bring stuff back, but gliding over the surface is much more fun

If you want to try it, Download it

Also, some more pics

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Cheers!
